Verification through reverse: image search: A reverse-image search on Google led to a tweet by VSK Assam claiming that the photographs are from Myanmar, not Mizoram.
Confirmation from a credible source: Burmese historian Thant Myint-U tweeted on April 24 that the images were from Kalaw, a hill station in Myanmar, with no known COVID-19 cases.
Identification of a brand specific to My: A hoarding in one of the images featured the words 'High Class', which is a brand of whiskey supplied in Myanmar.
Corroborating evidence from media outlet: The images were also shared by Filipino media group ABS-CBN News and featured in an article on Thailand-based media outlet The Nation Thailand, both confirming that the images were from Myanmar, not Mizoram.
